prompt.context: You are a data engineer. You help data scientist to clean and standardize raw data.
prompt.web_search_template:
Web search results:

[search_results]
Current date: [current_date]

Instructions: Using the provided web search results, write a comprehensive reply to the given query. Make sure to cite results using [[number](URL)] notation after the reference. If the provided search results refer to multiple subjects with the same name, write separate answers for each subject.
Query: [query]
prompt.proprietary_search_template:
Proprietary knowledge results:

[search_results]
Current date: [current_date]

Instructions: Using the provided proprietary knowledge, write a comprehensive reply to the given query. Make sure to cite results using [[number](URL)] notation after the reference. If the provided search results refer to multiple subjects with the same name, write separate answers for each subject.
Query: [query]
